sqlMap.select: select UPLOAD_ID, UPLOAD_DESC, UPLOAD_FILE_PATH, UPLOAD_PROGRESS, FILE_SIZE, FILE_ROWNUM, ERROR_ROWNUM, USER_ID, USER_NAME, IS_TITLE, to_char(START_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:Mi:ss') START_DATE from T01_SYS_UPLOAD_LOG where 1=1 and UPLOAD_DESC like '%'||#uploadDesc#||'%' and USER_NAME like '%'||#userName#||'%' order by UPLOAD_ID desc
select count(1) from T01_SYS_UPLOAD_LOG where 1=1 and UPLOAD_DESC like '%'||#uploadDesc#||'%' and USER_NAME like '%'||#userName#||'%'
